pkgmetadata.longdescription: Miscellaneous Functions for the Correlation Coefficient // Statistical test for the product-moment correlation coefficient based on H0: rho = rho0 including sample size computation, statistical test for comparing the product-moment correlation coefficient in independent and dependent samples, partial and semipartial correlation, sequential triangular test for the product-moment correlation coefficient, and simulation of bivariate normal and non-normal distribution with a specified correlation.
